item.title: Google Sign-In for ASP.NET Core Web APIs
item.description: There is a lot of tutorials that show how to integrate Google Sign-In in your website, but only a handful show how to integrate it in a REST API. Today I'll be showing how you can add Google Sign-In and still manage users in your back-end. Overview Here's a sequence diagram showing how it all works:
